prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies both technology and elegance, featuring intricate designs.
Show me a Steel-type Pokemon with a mechanical appearance and soft, rounded features.
Imagine a Fairy-type Pokemon with a combination of metallic and organic elements, showcasing gentleness.
Generate a Pokemon with large ears and a sleek, shiny body, perfect for a futuristic setting.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique blend of mechanical and organic traits, standing out in any environment.
Design a Pokemon that appears friendly yet powerful, with a design that hints at its legendary status.
Give me a Pokemon that looks both delicate and sturdy, capable of adapting to various habitats.
